name: AWS Solutions Architect - Associate
description: Advanced expertise in designing distributed systems, implementing security controls, defining networking architecture, and deploying scalable AWS solutions aligned with business requirements
earningCriteria: Successfully passed the AWS Solutions Architect - Associate exam
Demonstrated proficiency in designing distributed systems on AWS
Validated expertise in AWS security and networking

name: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
description: Fundamental understanding of AWS Cloud concepts, services, security best practices, architecture principles, pricing models, and support operations
earningCriteria: Successfully passed the AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner exam
Demonstrated understanding of AWS Cloud concepts and services

name: Google AI Essentials
description: Proficient in leveraging generative AI tools, LLMs, and prompt engineering for content development and task optimization. Skilled in responsible AI practices, bias identification, and staying current with AI advancements
earningCriteria: Successfully completed the Google AI Essentials certification
Demonstrated proficiency in AI tools and practices
